learning_outcomes: Understand and use B2 Sport vocabulary
Apply B2 Participle Clauses structures in context

content.prompt_es: Escribe la respuesta correcta para completar la oración:
content.stimulus_en: ______ (see) the accident, I called the police.

content.stimulus_en: ______ (finish) her work, she went home.
